title: PBE Link not working?
body: I got accepted into PBE and I tried to create an account for it. I pressed the link and it took a while to load for me to get a "Error: 500" with a blitzcrank above it. I tried mutiple times on mobile and  different browsers, but it seems to not work. I then tried to go on the league website and clicked "PBE become a tester" and it still showed the Error:500. Is there anything to fix this problem?

replies.body:
We're aware of an issue that some players are having on the PBE signup page. Some people have been able to get around that error 500 by using a VPN like [**CyberGhost**](http://www.cyberghostvpn.com/en_us), and others have been able to use [**this url**](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe-signup) to get in.

Let me know if either of those help!
Using CyberGhost seems to pass by the error 500. But when i try creating an account, it doesnt actually create the account instead it just refeshes the page without actually creating it. :/

Well it's good that we figured out that error, now let's see what's up with that refreshing.

I pulled up your account status, and it looks like we did get your original PBE application. At this point you haven't been invited onto the PBE servers quite yet (so I'm not sure what happened with that e-mail =\ ), but keep an eye out for when you do get accepted!
Im having the same problems that lead to this. i tried the cyberghost that you suggested him to do and it worked for me but same thing happens to what happened to him :(((
I've had the same problem happen to me. I have tried both ways, and it still says "Error 500".
